Title: ‘Largest Offshore Wind Transaction of Decade’ | Iberdrola, Masdar Ink East Anglia Three Co-Investment8 hours ago
Summary: Spanish renewable energy developer Iberdrola and UAE clean energy company Masdar have signed an agreement to co-invest in the 1.4 GW East Anglia Three project in the UK . After the closing of the transaction, each company will have a 50 per cent stake in and co-governance of the project . The partners signed the project financing for approximately EUR 4.1 billion with 24 international banks on 9 July .

Title: Work Starts on Brazil’s First Offshore Wind Project, Pilot Expected to Come Online in 3 Years14 days ago
Summary: Brazil's SENAI Institute of Innovation in Renewable Energy (ISI-ER) and SENAI’s Rio Grande do Norte branch, SENAI-RN, expect to receive an installation permit for their pilot project . This August, the developers will launch a public call inviting investors and partners who want to join the 24.5 MW, two-turbine pilot project.

Title: Stiesdal Starts Producing First TetraSub Floating Wind Foundation
Summary: Norwegian energy developer Stiesdal has started production of the first TetraSub floating foundation . The semi-submersible variant of the company’s Tetra concept is best suited for water depths ranging from 50 to 200 metres . Tetra sub is a response to the market that is expected to evolve as an extension of the fixed-bottom offshore wind market .

Title: Norway’s digital edge in the offshore wind transition
Summary: Many Norwegian companies offer advanced digital solutions for operational efficiency, safety and sustainability . At Global Offshore Wind 2025 in London, June 17–18, Norwegian offshore wind companies will gather in one place to show why they are global leaders in digitalisation .

Title: Hanwha Ocean’s 15 MW Floating Wind Platform Gets ABS Approval in Principle1 day ago
Summary: ABS has issued an Approval in Principle (AIP) to Hanwha Ocean for its semi-submersible floating offshore wind turbine design . The WindHive 15-H3 consists of three hexagonal columns and is designed for wind turbines with a rotor diameter of 240 metres . The South Korean company has secured orders for four WTIVs, according to information shared in January .

Title: Baltic Eagle Offshore Wind Farm Fully Energisedabout 1 hour ago
Summary: The Baltic Eagle offshore wind farm comprises 50 Vestas V174-9.5 MW wind turbines installed on monopile foundations . The wind turbine installation at the project site started in May 2024 and was completed in October 2024 . With a capacity of 476 MW, Baltic Eagle will supply around 475,000 households with renewable energy .

Title: East Anglia 3: ‘Largest Offshore Wind Transaction of Decade’
Summary: Spanish renewable energy developer Iberdrola and UAE clean energy company Masdar have signed an agreement to co-invest in the 1.4 GW East Anglia Three project in the UK . After the closing of the transaction, each company will have a 50 per cent stake in and co-governance of the project . The partners signed the project financing for approximately EUR 4.1 billion with 24 international banks on 9 July .

Title: First Power Flows from China’s Farthest Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: The 800 MW offshore wind farm will feature 98 turbines and three substations . The project is located in the northeastern sea area of Dafeng District, Yancheng City, and consists of four sites . The furthest site is 85.5 kilometres offshore and represents China’s farthest grid-connected wind farm .

Title: Ørsted Finalises EUR 2.6 Billion Financing for Taiwan’s Greater Changhua 2 Offshore Wind Project
Summary: Ørsted has secured a finance package of approximately TWD 90 billion (about EUR 2.64 billion) for the 632 MW Greater Changhua 2 offshore wind project in Taiwan . The developer reached financial close on the project finance package with 25 banks and five Export Credit Agencies (ECAs) The project’s first phase has been connected to the grid, and offshore construction is now underway .

Title: LS Marine Solution to Install Cables at 390 MW South Korean Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: LS Marine Solution has been selected as the preferred bidder for the submarine cable installation work at the Shinan Ui offshore wind project in South Korea . The 390 MW offshore wind farm is being developed by a consortium led by Hanwha Ocean and SK Eternics . The agreement follows other deals, including the contract for Taipower Offshore Wind Project Phase II (TPC Changhua Phase II)

Title: Opinion | Union Carpenters Are America’s Offshore Wind Workforce, New Jersey Is Our Training Ground
Summary: America’s offshore wind sector has grown from promising industry in Northeast to an economic powerhouse spanning over 40 states and supporting tens of billions in domestic investments . The United Brotherhood of Carpenters (UBC) has stepped up to ensure its members are ready to lead this next generation of energy infrastructure .

Title: Japanese Company Takes Part in Spain’s Floating Wind Demonstration Project15 days ago
Summary: Japan’s Electric Power Development, also known as J-Power, has joined the WHEEL floating offshore wind demonstration project in Spain . The project will feature one turbine installed three kilometres off the eastern coast of Gran Canaria, Spain . Foundation manufacturing is scheduled to begin this month, while installation is expected to commence in the first quarter of 2026 .

Title: GE Vernova to Build Up to 18 MW Offshore Wind Test Turbine in Norway
Summary: The Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate has granted GE Vernova’s subsidiary Georgine Wind permission to build and operate an 18 MW test turbine in Gulen municipality . The turbine is expected to have an annual electricity production of 55 GWh, which corresponds to the annual energy consumption of approximately 2,750 Norwegian households . The unit is planned to undergo testing for up to five years, after which it will remain on land and generate electricity for an additional 25 years .

Title: Offshore Wind Common Goal in Netherlands
Summary: In 2032, 75 per cent of all electricity produced in the Netherlands will come from offshore wind . This is according to Jan Vos, Chairman of NedZero, who discussed the Dutch offshore wind outlook on 27 November 2024 at Offshore Energy Exhibition & Conference in Amsterdam . Currently, the Netherlands has 4.5 GW of offshore wind capacity in operation and plans to have a total of 21 GW by 2032 .

Title: Offshore Work Starts at PGE, Ørsted’s Project Site in Poland
Summary: The vessel Olympic Electra has begun relocating boulders at the Baltica 2 project site . The project will feature 107 Siemens Gamesa 14 MW-222 turbines . The 1.5 GW offshore wind farm is planned to be fully commissioned by the end of 2027 .

Title: newNorway’s digital edge in the offshore wind transitionabout 1 month ago
Summary: Many Norwegian companies offer advanced digital solutions for operational efficiency, safety and sustainability . At Global Offshore Wind 2025 in London, June 17–18, Norwegian offshore wind companies will gather in one place to show why they are global leaders in digitalisation .

Title: Baltic Eagle Offshore Wind Farm Fully Energised
Summary: The Baltic Eagle offshore wind farm comprises 50 Vestas V174-9.5 MW wind turbines installed on monopile foundations . The wind turbine installation at the project site started in May 2024 and was completed in October 2024 . With a capacity of 476 MW, Baltic Eagle will supply around 475,000 households with renewable energy .

Title: Ørsted Finalises EUR 2.6 Billion Financing for Taiwan’s Greater Changhua 2 Offshore Wind Project7 hours ago
Summary: Ørsted has secured a finance package of approximately TWD 90 billion (about EUR 2.64 billion) for the 632 MW Greater Changhua 2 offshore wind project in Taiwan . The developer reached financial close on the project finance package with 25 banks and five Export Credit Agencies (ECAs) The project’s first phase has been connected to the grid, and offshore construction is now underway .

Title: DNV to Certify Ventyr’s Offshore Wind Farm in Norway
Summary: DNV has been awarded a contract by Ventyr, a consortium consisting of Parkwind and Ingka Investments, for the Design Certification of the Sørlige Nordsjø II wind turbines and offshore substation in Norway . The project will have a maximum capacity of 1,500 MW and up to 100 turbines . The development area spans approximately 520 square kilometres and is located 200 kilometres from the Norwegian southwest coast .

Title: First Turbine Up at 1.2 GW Baltic Power Offshore Wind Farm in Poland
Summary: The first of 76 Vestas 15 MW turbines has been installed at the Baltic Power offshore wind farm in Poland . The 1.2 GW project is preparing for the installation of inter-array and export cables and offshore substations later this year . Cadeler has been selected as the transport and installation contractor by the joint venture .

Title: Italy’s Ports of Augusta, Taranto to Become Offshore Wind Hubs
Summary: A decree has been approved by the Italian government to establish offshore wind manufacturing and assembly hubs at the ports of Augusta and Taranto . The total investment amounts to EUR 78.3 million, to be distributed over three years starting in 2025 . Funding will come from reallocation of revenues generated by CO2 emission allowance auctions . Italy so far has one operational offshore wind farm, the Beleolico project off Taranto, in the Mediterranean Sea .

Title: 1 Pct of Global Offshore Wind Investments Could Restore Millions of Square Kilometres of Marine Ecosystems, Study Finds2 days ago
Summary: Global offshore wind investments are projected to be USD 6 trillion (approximately EUR 5.1 trillion) from now until 2050 . Key global nature preservation and restoration goals, including the UN target to restore 30 per cent of degraded ecosystems by 2030, are slipping out of reach due to a lack of funding and political will . The Rich North Sea programme and the Royal Netherlands Institute for Sea Research conducted the study .

Title: Offshore Work Starts at PGE and Ørsted’s 1.5 GW Project Site in Poland1 day ago
Summary: The vessel Olympic Electra has begun relocating boulders at the Baltica 2 project site . The project will feature 107 Siemens Gamesa 14 MW-222 turbines . The 1.5 GW offshore wind farm is planned to be fully commissioned by the end of 2027 .

Title: Jasmund Offshore Substation Jacket Takes Final Shape
Summary: Cable deck has been installed at the Jasmun offshore substation jacket, marking the completion of the jacket’s final structural shape . The structure has a total load-out weight of around 4,500 metric tonnes and a top steel height of 72 metres . Once operational, the Jasmund substation will serve as a connection point between Windanker offshore wind farm and the electricity grid .

Title: Germany’s SEFE and UAE’s ADNOC Gas strengthen energy ties with LNG deal
Summary: Germany’s Securing Energy for Europe (SEFE) has expanded its liquefied natural gas arsenal through a multi-year LNG supply agreement with ADNOC Gas . The three-year supply agreement, valued at approximately $400 million, will enable SEFE to get over 0.7 million tonnes of LNG from the UAE-based company's Das Island liquefaction facility .

Title: Germany’s SEFE and UAE’s ADNOC Gas strengthen energy ties with LNG deal2 hours ago
Summary: Germany’s Securing Energy for Europe (SEFE) has expanded its liquefied natural gas arsenal through a multi-year LNG supply agreement with ADNOC Gas . Title: North Sea oil & gas search underway as drilling ops kick off at first of three wells
Summary: Norwegian oil and gas company OKEA has begun its three-well hydrocarbon exploration drilling campaign in the North Sea off the Norwegian coast . The operator has started drilling the first exploration well at its producing Brage field . The exploration well is the first of three consecutive wells to be drilled in the same campaign on the Brage platform .

Summary: Summary not available.

Title: First jacket comes to slide into place at huge offshore gas project
Summary: Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) has completed the load-out and transport of the first jacket for its multibillion-dollar giant sour gas development . ADNOC aims to become the world's first project to operate with net-zero emissions . The jacket’s load out was followed by its transportation from the fabrication yard to the cargo barge, enabling it to be carried by a vessel 160 kilometers offshore for installation .

Title: Offshore work starts at PGE, Ørsted's 1.5 GW Polish OWF site
Summary: The vessel Olympic Electra has begun relocating boulders at the Baltica 2 project site . The project will feature 107 Siemens Gamesa 14 MW-222 turbines, for whose storage, pre-assembly, and offshore installation, the wind turbine manufacturer will use the Port of Gdansk . The 1.5 GW offshore wind farm will be fully commissioned by the end of 2027 .

Title: Australia ups decarbonization ante: First offshore CCS undertaking gets major project status
Summary: A carbon capture and storage (CCS) project in the G-7-AP greenhouse gas (GHG) assessment block off the northwestern coast of the Northern Territory of Australia has secured the Australian government’s backing with the award of a major project status . The Bonaparte CCS project, located offshore northwest of Darwin, is anticipated to support emissions reductions in hard-to-abate sectors such as metal and chemical refining .

Title: Venture Global secures top spot in Germany’s LNG market with expanded SEFE deal9 hours ago
Summary: Germany's Securing Energy for Europe (SEFE) has finalized an agreement with U.S. energy player Venture Global to purchase an additional quantity of liquefied natural gas (LNG) from a project the latter is developing in Louisiana, United States . Under the deal, SEFE Energy will buy an additional 0.75 million tonnes per annum (mtpa) of LNG from CP2 LNG for 20 years . The new contract will increase the total volume of L

Title: Unlocking Digital Potential in Offshore Wind
Summary: The offshore wind industry stands at a pivotal moment. With the growing global demand for renewable energy, the sector must evolve beyond traditional installation methods to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance sustainability . Harnessing data-driven insights, automation, and system integration can revolutionize offshore wind installation, enabling the industry to scale more effectively .

Title: Bardex Corp. Opens Australia Office, Focusing on Multi-Purpose Ports to Support Maritime Sustainment, Offshore Energy, and More
Summary: Richard McAllister heads the new Melbourne office as Director of Bardex Australia . His focus will be on strategic ports and shipyards that prepare Australia to meet the growing demands for maritime sustainment, offshore wind, and decommissioning oil and gas assets . Such projects will benefit local economies and workforces .

Title: Glamox to Light Up Hornsea 3 Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Lightin specialist Glamox has won a contract to provide marine lighting for foundation platforms of 2.9 GW Hornsea 3 offshore wind farm in the North Sea, off UK . The wind farm, to be located 120 km off the coast of Norfolk, England, is projected to generate more electricity than Hornsea 1 and 2 combined .

Title: Former Shell Senior Joins BP’s Board
Summary: Former Shell CFO Simon Henry will join BP’s board effective September 1, 2025 . Henry has wide-ranging expertise and experience in global finance, strategy, governance and management .

Title: Valeura Makes Progress with Multi-Well Drilling Campaign...
Summary: Valeura Energy has advanced its multi-well drilling campaign offshore Thaild, using Borr Drilling’s Mist jack-up rig . The drilling campaign is progressing as planned toward its objective of approximately 10 new development wells . Valeura took a final investment decision on redevelopment the Wassana field in licence G10/48 in May 2025 .

Title: Baltic Eagle Offshore Wind Farm Comes Online in Germany
Summary: The Baltic Eagle offshore wind farm will supply around 475,000 households with renewable energy while reducing carbon dioxide emissions by about 800,000 tons per year . It is the first project completed under the strategic partnership .

Title: Rem Offshore's Zero-Emission Subsea Construction Vessel...
Summary: Norwegian shipowner Rem Offshore has launched the hull for its dual-fuel methanol energy subsea construction vessel (ESCV) Rem Pioneer in Vietnam, months ahead of schedule . The newbuild uses a number of solutions where energy consumption is almost halved compared to comparable tonnage in today's market .

Title: Drilling Hardware
Summary: Offshore drilling contractor Borr Drilling has singed new contract commitments for four of its premium jack-up rigs . The new awards have a combined duration of approximately 1,300 days, including fixed priced options, and an estimated contract revenue of more than $129 million, according to Borr . JDR Cable Systems has secured a contract from Larsen & Toubro (L&T), an Indian multinational engaged in EPC projects, to assist with offshore umbilical testing in

Title: Clean Power Starts Flowing from China’s Furthermost Offshore Wind Project
Summary: China Three Gorges Corporation’s offshore wind project in Dafeng, Jiangsu achieved its first grid connection . The project consists of four sites, with the furthest located 85.5 kilometers offshore . Equipped with 98 turbines and three offshore booster stations, the project is expected to generate over 2.6 billion kWh of electricity per year .

Title: LNG
Summary: The Norwegian Offshore Directorate (NOD) has granted Equinor a drilling permit for two wildcat wells in the North Sea . The Bonaparte CCS project has been awarded Major Project Status by the Australian Government . Woodside Energy has signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Hyundai Engineering and Hyundai Glovis .

Title: Northern Ocean’s DeepSea Mira Semi-Sub Gets Drilling Job...
Summary: Northern Ocean has signed a contract with a subsidiary of Rhino Resources for the DeepSea Mira semi-submersible drilling rig . Rhino will use the Deepsea Mira rig for the drilling of the Volans-1X exploration well, the third successive well to be drilled on PEL85 license .

Title: JDR to Test Cables on Middle Eastern Offshore Platforms...
Summary: JDR Cable Systems has secured a contract from Larsen & Toubro to test 14 umbilical cables for offshore platforms in the Middle East . The work includes pre-deployment testing, monitoring during lay operations, and integration testing .

Title: Lloyd's Register Study Identifies Hidden Fatigue Risks in Offshore Wind Tech
Summary: Offshore wind turbines are typically designed for 25 years of service, using a fatigue design factor of three, implying a minimum required fatigue life of 75 years . A critical joint in the jacket foundation would reach the end of its fatigue life after just 52 years, falling short of this design requirement .

Summary: Summary not available.

Title: COSLInnovator Rig Cleared for Two-Well Drilling Op in...
Summary: Equinor granted a drilling permit for two wildcat wells in the North Sea . The rig is able to operate in water depths up to 750 meters and is designed for North Sea and worldwide use in harsh environments .

Title: Offshore Engineer TV
Summary: Norwegian oil and gas company Aker BP has completed the installation of a jacket for a new production platform at the Valhall field in the Southern North Sea . Titomic is ‘leading the future’ with Cold Spray Solutions, additive manufacturing of new products and components for newbuild and repair projects .

Title: Offshore News

Norwegian data and intelligence firm TGS has signed a collaboration agreement with Equinor .

Title: Staatsolie Takes Back Offshore Oil Block in Suriname as...
Summary: U.S. oil producer Hess Corp has decided to withdraw from Suriname's offshore Block 59 . ExxonMobil and Equinor had exited from the block feeling there was too much risk . Block 59's sea depth ranges between 2,700 and 3,500 meters .

Title: Masdar, Iberdrola to Co-Invest $6B in East Anglia THREE Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Abu Dhabi Future Energy Company (Masdar) and Iberdrola have agreed to co-invest $6.08 billion in the 1.4 GW East Anglia THREE offshore wind farm in the U.K., in what’s said to be the largest offshore wind transaction of the decade . Each company will have a 50% stake in and co-governance of the asset .

Title: Offshore Technology
Summary: Vår Energi has entered into a collaboration agreement with TechnipFMC Norge for delivery of subsea projects utilizing its integrated model to fast-track future developments in the Gjøa area in the North Sea . Fugro has formed a partnership with DTACT, a high-tech software company, and a specialist in AI-powered satellite intelligence, to develop a data fusion and intelligence platform for critical subsea infrastructure .

Title: Australian Engineering Firm Gets Work on Shell’s Crux Gas Platform
Summary: Engineering company Monadelphous Group secured new contracts in the energy sector valued at more than $100 million . Work at Shell's Crux gas platform and Origin Energy’s LNG project .

Title: First Steel Cut for Rem Offshore’s Third Vard-Built CSOV
Summary: The CSOV is tailored to provide services during the construction, operation, and maintenance of offshore wind farms worldwide . The vessel's size is 85 m by 19.5 m with cabins for up to 120 people, including 93 wind turbine technicians and a crew of up to 27 people .

Title: Empire Energy, Ellevo Set Up Joint Offshore Wind Lifting...
Summary: Empire Energy and Ellevo Group have launched a strategic joint venture for offshore wind lifting and transport consultancy services . The joint venture provides coordinated solutions for lifting and heavy transport operations across the offshore wind project lifecycle . It integrates engineering assurance with on-the-ground delivery experience .

Title: E-CTV Aces Tryouts at Scottish Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Artemis Technologies has demonstrated its latest electric crew transfer vessel (E-CTV) at Vattenfall's Aberdeen offshore wind farm . The demonstration marks a major milestone, showcasing the culmination of research, design and development over a number of years .

Title: Offshore
Summary: A towing incident has occurred on Saudi oil and gas drilling contractor ADES Holding’s jack-up barge Admarine 12, which capsized offshore Eqypt, killing four people, while three remain missing . Woodside Energy has signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Hyundai Engineering and Hyundai Glovis, establishing a strategic framework to collaborate on liquefied natural gas project development, engineering services and shipping logistics .

Title: UK Bags $10B Japanese Investment for Offshore Wind and...
Summary: Sumitomo Corporation aims to facilitate the investment into key U.K. infrastructure and clean energy projects by 2035 . The investment will be focused on key offshore wind and hydrogen projects, supporting the UK’s aim to become a clean energy superpower .

Title: Drilling
Summary: Equinor and its partners have made a gas discovery in the Skred prospect, located near the Johan Castberg field in the Barents Sea, off Norway . The size of the discovery is between 0.3 and 0.5 billion standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable gas .

Summary: Equinor and its partners have made a gas discovery in the Skred prospect, located near the Johan Castberg field in the Barents Sea, off Norway . The size of the discovery is between 0.3 and 0.5 billion standard cubic metres (Sm3) of recoverable gas .

Title: Island Offshore Takes Delivery of Revamped Well...
Summary: Island Wellsaver was built in 2008 and delivered to Island Offshore with minimal downtime . The vessel performs light well intervention on existing subsea wells to stimulate, increase or log production .

Title: Financing in Place for 632MW Taiwanese Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Ørsted has raised approximately $3.1 billion (about DKK 20 billion) for the project . Greater Changhua 2 is a 632 MW offshore wind farm that is currently under construction and is expected to be commissioned towards the end of 2025 .

Title: Ventyr Enlists DNV to Certify Norway’s First Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: DNV has been awarded a contract by offshore wind developer Ventyr for the Design Certification of the Sørlige Nordsjø II wind turbines and offshore substation . The project is Norway’s first bottom-fixed offshore wind farm .

Title: Woodside Finds South Korean Partners to Advance LNG Value...

The parties will collaborate on project development, engineering services and shipping logistics . The MoU will see the parties focus on advancing execution capability and extending their reach into priority LNG markets .

Title: Glamox Wins Contract to Light the World’s Largest Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Glamox will provide marine-certified LED luminaires for Hornsea 3, which will be the world’s largest single offshore wind farm . The wind farm will generate 2.9 GW of clean electricity, sufficient to power more than 3 million homes in the UK .

Title: Offshore Power Agreements Delayed Citing Uncertainties in US Policy
Summary: Massachusetts selected nearly 2.7 GW of offshore power in the 2024 solicitation across three projects . Developers cite the continuing uncertainties in U.S. policy and, for the first time, raised the possibility of canceling agreements in their most recent filing .

Title: Canada Grants Investigational Permit for West Coast Offshore Wind Farm
Summary: Canada granted investigative Use Permit to Oceanic Wind Energy for what could become the country’s first offshore wind farm . The company highlights the energy demands of the Port of Prince Rupert and the growing industrial and resource sectors in the northern reaches of British Columbia .

Title: MARAD Receives Proposal for Floating Offshore LNG Export Terminal off Texas
Summary: A developer has filed a novel proposal with the Maritime Administration (MARAD) and the U.S. Coast Guard for the ST LNG Deepwater Port Development Project . The new terminal would be located approximately 10.4 nautical miles offshore Matagorda, Texas . The project would be completed in four phases .

Summary: MOL's engagement in space-related business focuses on the offshore launch and recovery of rockets . Aiming for commercialization around 2030, its first step will be to develop a recovery vessel, followed by a feasibility study of the commercialization of an offshore launch vessel .
